mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Users ( user_id, user_type, phone, password, name, gender, birth, nickname, sido, sigungu, is_partner, created_at ) VALUES ( user_seq.NEXTVAL, #{user_type}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{nickname}, #{sido}, #{sigungu}, #{is_partner}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE Users SET password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, sido = #{sido}, sigungu = #{sigungu} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
